# Donloading Data

```{r}

countsFile <- system.file("example_data/GSE134118_Table_S3.xlsx", 
                        package="easyreporting")

geneCounts <- as.data.frame(readxl::read_xlsx(countsFile))
rownames(geneCounts) <- geneCounts$`Feature ID`
geneCounts <- geneCounts[,c(2:7)]

factors <- colnames(geneCounts)

```
